title: How Filters Work
content: Filters allow only certain wavelengths of light to pass through them, while blocking other wavelengths.

question.title: Question #1
question.label:
To better understand how filters work, try out the filter tool.

Select a filter from the dropdown menu and observe the effect that filter has on the light coming out of the prism.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Choose the violet filter. What color of light passes through the violet filter?

question.title: Question #1
question.label: With the violet filter selected, what colors of light are being blocked by the violet filter?

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Objects in space can emit many different wavelengths of light, from gamma-rays to radio. If you had access to filters for all the different wavelengths of light and wanted to observe the ultraviolet light from an object in space, what filter would you use?
